Title: Speakeasy Rider
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Rich Rinaldi, Mike Benner (staff writer)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: Tina, Gene and Louise are ready to put the pedal to the metal when they join a go-kart league. Meanwhile, at the restaurant Bob and Teddy partner up to serve Teddy's home-brewed beer.
